item.title: Moving to Codeberg
item.description: I'm moving all of my repositories, including this website to Codeberg. This doesn't mean I'll completely ditch Github and Gitlab, though. The repositories will still be available on those Git hosting services as mirrors. Contributions to my projects on both sites will be accepted, but PLEASE contribute on Codeberg if you can because I prefer using it. I'll write a follow-up post about why I'm migrating to Codeberg once the migration process is finished. Also, keep an eye out for my Codeberg profile!

item.title: Moving to Wayland!
item.description: As I'm experiencing some problems with Xorg, I will be switching to Wayland, because why not? I think it's worth to give it a try because many people are already using Wayland as their daily driver. I will make a video and a blog post about my experiences of using it and my thoughts on it. I may even use Wayland as my daily driver if I'm really liking it. Hope it will be a great experience :)

item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Thanks for checking out my blog! This is my first post to test out Luke Smith's lb, which powers this blog. Also, don't forget to subscribe this blog's RSS feed!

Thanks for checking out my blog!

item.title: More Pages will be Added
item.description:
I'm a little bit busy, so I don't have much time to give attention to this site. But hey, I made a little progress by adding this page. More pages will be added soon on this site, so please be patient. If I have plenty of time, I will start focusing on the development of this website (...and maybe the YAGAI project, I will write about it in the next time). Anyway, hope you enjoy visiting my website :)

Lol what the heck did I wrote in this post
